subcategory.subcategory: Equipment for the production of bags from non-woven materials
subcategory.subcategory_uz: Noto'qima materiallardan sumkalar ishlab chiqarish uskunlari
subcategory.subcategory_en: Equipment for the production of bags from non-woven materials

title: Non-woven bag making machine US-ZD-L700B
title_uz: Noto'qima materiallardan sumka ishlab chiqarish uskunasi US-ZD-L700B
title_ru: Оборудование для производства мешков из нетканого материала US-ZD-L700B
short_description: This US-ZD-L700B equipment is used for the production of bags with handles from non-woven materials. Production speed reaches from 50 to 120 pieces per minute. The total power of the equipment is 18 kW, the width of the produced bag is 100-800 mm, and the length is 200-600 mm. The equipment with a total weight of 2500 kg is 10.3 m long, 2 m wide and 2.1 m high.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-ZD-L700B uskuna noto'qima materiallardan tutqichli sumkalar ishlab chiqarish uchun xizmat qiladi. Ishlab chiqarish tezligi daqiqasiga 50 tadan 120 tagacha yetadi. Uskunaning umumiy quvvati 18 kW, ishlab chiqariladigan sumka kengligi 100-800 mm, uzunligi esa 200-600 mm. Umumiy vazni 2500 kg ni tashkil qiluvchi uskunaning uzunligi 10.3 m, kengligi 2 m va balandligi 2.1 m.
short_description_ru: Данное оборудование US-ZD-L700B используется для производства сумок с ручками из нетканых материалов. Скорость производства достигает от 50 до 120 штук в минуту. Суммарная мощность оборудования 18 кВт, ширина изготавливаемого мешка 100-800 мм, длина 200-600 мм. Оборудование общим весом 2500 кг имеет длину 10,3 м, ширину 2 м и высоту 2,1 м.
short_description_en: This US-ZD-L700B equipment is used for the production of bags with handles from non-woven materials. Production speed reaches from 50 to 120 pieces per minute. The total power of the equipment is 18 kW, the width of the produced bag is 100-800 mm, and the length is 200-600 mm. The equipment with a total weight of 2500 kg is 10.3 m long, 2 m wide and 2.1 m high.
long_description:
This US-ZD-L700B equipment is used for the production of bags with handles from non-woven materials. Production speed reaches from 50 to 120 pieces per minute. The total power of the equipment is 18 kW, the width of the produced bag is 100-800 mm, and the length is 200-600 mm. The equipment with a total weight of 2500 kg is 10.3 m long, 2 m wide and 2.1 m high.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-ZD-L700B US-ZD-L800B
Handle loop sealing speed 20-75 pcs/min
Bag making speed 50-120 pcs/min
Bag width 100-800 mm
Bag length................................................... 200-600 mm.......................................................... 200-700 mm.............................................................
Bag making thickness 30-120 g
Voltage 380/220 V
Total power 18 kW 20 kW
Dimension 10.3 * 2 * 2.1 m 10.3 * 2.2 * 2.3 m
Weight 2500 kg 2700 kg
long_description_uz:
Ushbu US-ZD-L700B uskuna noto'qima materiallardan tutqichli sumkalar ishlab chiqarish uchun xizmat qiladi. Ishlab chiqarish tezligi daqiqasiga 50 tadan 120 tagacha yetadi. Uskunaning umumiy quvvati 18 kW, ishlab chiqariladigan sumka kengligi 100-800 mm, uzunligi esa 200-600 mm. Umumiy vazni 2500 kg ni tashkil qiluvchi uskunaning uzunligi 10.3 m, kengligi 2 m va balandligi 2.1 m.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-ZD-L700B US-ZD-L800B
Tutqich qo'yish tezligi 20-75 dona/min
Sumka ishlab chiqarish tezligi 50-120 dona/min
Sumka kengligi 100-800 mm
Sumka uzunligi................................................... 200-600 mm.......................................................... 200-700 mm.............................................................
Sumka qalinligi 30-120 g
Kuchlanishi 380/220 V
Umumiy quvvati 18 kW 20 kW
O'lchami 10.3 * 2 * 2.1 m 10.3 * 2.2 * 2.3 m
Vazni 2500 kg 2700 kg
long_description_ru:
Данное оборудование US-ZD-L700B используется для производства сумок с ручками из нетканых материалов. Скорость производства достигает от 50 до 120 штук в минуту. Суммарная мощность оборудования 18 кВт, ширина изготавливаемого мешка 100-800 мм, длина 200-600 мм. Оборудование общим весом 2500 кг имеет длину 10,3 м, ширину 2 м и высоту 2,1 м.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-ZD-L700B US-ZD-L800B
Ручка положить скорость 20-75 шт./мин.
Скорость производства пакетов 50-120 шт./мин.
Ширина сумки 100-800 мм
Длина сумки................................................... 200-600 мм.......................................................... 200-700 мм.............................................................
Толщина мешка 30-120 г
Напряжение 380/220 B
Общая мощность 18 кВт 20 кВт
Размер 10.3 * 2 * 2.1 м 10.3 * 2.2 * 2.3 м
Масса 2500 кг 2700 кг
long_description_en:

The total power of the equipment is 18 kW, the width of the produced bag is 100-800 mm, and the length is 200-600 mm. The equipment with a total weight of 2500 kg is 10.3 m long, 2 m wide and 2.1 m high.

Handle loop sealing speed 20-75 pcs/min
Bag making speed 50-120 pcs/min
Bag width 100-800 mm
Bag length................................................... 200-600 mm.......................................................... 200-700 mm.............................................................
Bag making thickness 30-120 g
